item.description:
Hi Everybody-
Simon was part of the Beta test for Snif tag and they are having a Picnic at Peter's Park and I thought it would be a great opportunity for the dogs to get together. Simon and Louie are missing their frenchie buddies since we were out of town. So if you want to join for fun we'll be in the smaller fenced in area at noon but not sure after that pending set up with the picnic.

No fee involved-just wanted to give everybody an opportunity to mingle while the weather is still wonderful!

Hope you join us!
Terri, Simon & Louie
item.how_to_find_us: We all look like our pics

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Doggie Picnic at Peter's Park
